data.title: Heidi Klum makes it official, files for divorce
data.meta_description: Believe it or not, Heidi Klum and Seal really are getting divorced.The supermodel has formally moved to end her marriage to the singer, filing for divorce in a Los Angeles court.The pair had what’s known in the business as a “storybook” romance, which included annual renewals of their wedding vows and elaborate Halloween costume parties.They […]
data.text:
Believe it or not, Heidi Klum and Seal really are getting divorced.

The supermodel has formally moved to end her marriage to the singer, filing for divorce in a Los Angeles court.

The pair had what’s known in the business as a “storybook” romance, which included annual renewals of their wedding vows and elaborate Halloween costume parties.

They have four children, including a daughter of Klum’s from a previous relationship. Klum is seeking sole physical custody of the children, with Seal getting visitation and joint legal custody.

Klum’s filing gives few other details, citing irreconcilable differences as the cause of the split. It also says that they entered into a financial agreement after they were married on how to divide their assets.

The Associated Press contributed to this report.
